name: In Slide - Image Puzzle for Instagram
name_original: In Slide - Image Puzzle for Instagram
description:
An image slider puzzle using images from Instagram.

Four difficulty levels (three on iPhone) for different length puzzles.

Use Instagram photos from any tag, your photos, your friends photos and nearby photos. 

NEW - challenge your friends to beat your time, share though Facebook, Twitter, email, iMessage.

Requires internet connection to download images.
